mapper.insert: insert into board (ctg_no, user_no, board_title, board_content, board_nick, board_ip) values (#{ctg_no}, #{user_no}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, (select user_nick from user where user_no = #{user_no}), #{board_ip});
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_like l WHERE l.board_no = b.board_no) AS like_count, r.* FROM board b LEFT JOIN board_like l ON b.board_no = l.board_no LEFT JOIN board_reply r ON b.board_no = r.board_no WHERE b.board_no = #{board_no};
mapper.update: update board set board_hit = board_hit + 1 where board_no = #{board_no}
update board set board_like = board_like + 1 where board_no = #{board_no}
update board set board_like = board_like - 1 where board_no = #{board_no}
